description.value: When character triggers Psychic Phenomena when manifesting a power of the Sanctic Daemonology Disicpline, they can spend a Fate Point to entirely negate the result.

system.benefit: When character triggers Psychic Phenomena when manifesting a power of the Sanctic Daemonology Disicpline, they can spend a Fate Point to entirely negate the result.

prerequisites.text: Tier 3: Daemonologist, Favoured by the Warp, Willpower 50.
